function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Coronavirus transmission through contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces, especially those with high contact","Technologies":"Alcohol-based disinfectants, UV-C sterilization","People":"General public, healthcare workers, employees in high-contact areas","Owner":"Government, healthcare facilities, business owners"},{"Description":"Sustaining time of Coronavirus on different metal surfaces","Impact":"Prolonged virus survival and potential transmission","Mitigation":"Use of alcohol-based disinfectants, regular cleaning of metal surfaces","Technologies":"Alcohol-based disinfectants, UV-C sterilization","People":"General public, employees working with metal surfaces","Owner":"Government, business owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Similar behavior of SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV-1 on metal surfaces and in aerosols","Impact":"Risk of transmission of both viruses through contaminated surfaces and aerosols","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces, use of personal protective equipment (PPE) for aerosol protection","Technologies":"Alcohol-based disinfectants, UV-C sterilization, PPE","People":"General public, healthcare workers, employees in high-contact areas","Owner":"Government, healthcare facilities, business owners"}]}
